categories: Category:Imperial-class Star Destroyers of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: Impending Doom was an Imperial-class Star Destroyer of the Imperial Starfleet.

The Impending Doom was the flagship of Moff Nile Owen and Admiral Sahreel of the Rayter sector. During the Galactic Civil War, Owen used the ship during Operation 45RA to gain the favor of the Shashay and to deal with the traitor Braig Farool.
